li.a: G Suite for Education Notice to Parents and Guardians

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

img.alt: Image of the Arapahoe School Falcon Logo

div.p:
Miss Hudson has begun reading the chapter book Charlotte's Web by E.B. White on her youtube channel. The first 5 chapters for this week are up now; stay tuned if you are interested in listening to the rest of this book with her first grade class.
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzLeG-p3BE3gjGMvn3OCsbA?view_as=subscriber
This morning we are sending our condolences to those who have been impacted by recent loss. Our hearts and prayers go out to all of our students and families.

Self-care at this time can be challenging. Please try to use healthy coping skills such as those sent home for your elementary students each week. Some great skills to help cope with change, loss and life are taking deep breaths, counting, singing, dancing, laughing, sharing memories, trying your best to be positive, arts/crafts, and reading books as a family.

Change and loss are challenging, especially during this mandatory isolation. Please know our hearts are with you all during this time. Also, if you know individuals that are unable to keep themselves safe due to depression or dealing with grief during this challenging time, please call 911 and get them help. Everyone matters!
--Dr. Nunez
Student iPads for Kindergarten, 1st, and 2nd grades to be delivered to homes on Tuesday 4/21/2020.

Tous!
Here's some tips for engaging your kiddos. Sometimes when we're together for a long time, when we're not used to it, it takes some reminders to continue to engage and work together. Here's a few tips below.

WiFi hotspots will be delivered today with the lunch run. Please keep in mind that only students in need of internet will receive a hotspot.
Also, Kindergarten-2nd will receive their iPads tomorrow during the lunch run.

h3.a: Please Contact Us About Phone Number and Address Changes

div.p: Our staff wants to keep in touch with every student and be available to them and to parents. Please make sure your phone number and address are updated. Leave a message at 856-9333 to give us any...
